= Aerie Policy Entitlements
:toc:
:toclevels: 2

== Purpose

Policy-based module entitlements are enforced at the GraphQL gateway. All
queries and subscriptions require a valid A2ML-attested entitlement policy.

== Enforcement

* Policy format: A2ML profile
* Enforced at: GraphQL gateway (pre-resolver)
* Proof required: Yes (light or full envelope)

== Module Catalog

[cols="1,2,2",options="header"]
|===
| Module ID | Name | Required Claims

| core.telemetry
| Core Telemetry
| telemetry:read

| forensics.routes
| Route Forensics
| forensics:read

| audit.attested
| Attested Audit
| audit:read
|===
